General.Name: Gafisa S.A
General.Description: Gafisa S.A. operates as a homebuilder under the Gafisa brand name in Brazil. The company engages in the development, sale, and brokerage of residential units, such as luxury buildings with swimming pools, gyms, visitor parking, and other amenities for higher and middle-income customers; entry-level buildings and house units for middle-low-income customers; and commercial units. It also develops land subdivisions for sale; and provides construction, technical, and real estate management services to third parties. Gafisa S.A. was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: No. 1830, Av. Pres. Juscelino Kubitschek, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 04543-900
